<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157868</entry>
  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2295</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Accélération</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accelerazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aceleración</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation of a car in motion in which the user sets the acceleration and is able to observe the increase in speed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation eines Autos in der Bewegung, in 
der der Benutzer die Beschleunigung einstellt und kann, die Zunahme 
der Geschwindigkeit zu beobachten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation d'une voiture dans le mouvement 
dans lequel l'utilisateur place l'accélération et peut observer 
l'augmentation de la vitesse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation de um carro no movimento em que o 
usuário ajusta o acceleration e pode  observar o aumento na 
velocidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione di un automobile nel movimento in 
cui l'utente regola l'accelerazione e può osservare l'aumento nella 
velocità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα ενός αυτοκινήτου σε κίνηση στην οποία 
ο χρήστης θέτει την ταχύτητα και είναι σε θέση να παρατηρήσει 
την αύξηση στην ταχύτητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación de un coche en el movimiento en el
cual el utilizador fija la aceleración y puede observar el aumento en
velocidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accélération</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
